sections.title: Twilight Talon (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Twilight Talon class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Many Hats (Ex) (Twilight Talon)
sections.description: Allows the Twilight Talon to substitute Sense Motive checks for specific Profession checks when within 60 feet of someone with ranks in those professions.
keywords: sense motive in place of profession
architect barrister clerk courtesan driver engineer innkeeper librarian merchant scribe

sections.title: Sneak Attack (Twilight Talon)
sections.description: Functions as rogue sneak attack, dealing 1d6 extra damage at 1st level and increasing by 1d6 every 3 levels thereafter.

sections.title: Enhanced Tattoo (Sp) (Twilight Talon)
sections.description: Grants spell-like abilities through the Twilight Tattoo feat, with new options available every 2 levels starting at 2nd level.

sections.title: Resourceful Agent (Ex) (Twilight Talon)
sections.description: Improves damage with improvised weapons by one step at 2nd level, grants improved critical range and Critical Focus at 5th level, and Staggering Critical at 9th level.

sections.title: Eye for Detail (Ex) (Twilight Talon)
sections.description: Grants a +8 bonus on Linguistics checks to forge government documents, as if having seen similar documents before.

sections.title: Dead Drop (Ex) (Twilight Talon)
sections.description: Allows access to cached equipment by paying into a fund, with improved efficiency and higher limits at 8th level.

sections.title: Unassuming Presence (Su) (Twilight Talon)
sections.description: Uses swift action opposed Bluff checks against enemies within 30 feet to attempt Stealth as if having concealment, usable three times per day.
